name: ByteFifoBufferTest
description: Unit tests for ByteFifoBuffer class, covering various methods like length, read, write, etc.

test_cases.description: Tests the length method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testRead
test_cases.description: Tests the read method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testReadWithOffset
test_cases.description: Tests the read method with an offset for destination buffer.

test_cases.description: Tests the getWriteRemaining method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testGetBuffered
test_cases.description: Tests the getBuffered method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testWrite
test_cases.description: Tests the write method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testWriteWithOffset
test_cases.description: Tests the write method with an offset.

test_cases.name: testConsumeWriteBuffer
test_cases.description: Tests the consumeWriteBuffer method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.description: Tests the setCapacity method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.description: Tests the consumeReadData method of ByteFifoBuffer.

test_cases.name: testReadOffset

test_cases.name: testWriteReadWriteRead

test_cases.description: Tests multiple writeOffset and readOffset operations.
